attributes.action: Having an Elected Youth Parliment across England
attributes.additional_details: In this society, with education and youth activities being cut, Youth have no say. I would like to change this to have a Youth election every 4 years for people over 12. This would represent everyones citizenship to the country. Some policies formed in this Government would go on to Parliment. I am serious. It is our future and our needs need to be voiced. With things being cut, enviromental damage going to live, WE NEED TO HAVE A SAY.
